markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arise, ye Worthy!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2543) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp. You can cast [_breath of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=29) as a divine innate spell once per day.
name: Arise, ye Worthy!
